name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Genshin Impact Yoimiya Amber Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the vibrant energy of Yoimiya and Amber from Genshin Impact to your Chrome browser with this live wallpaper extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy a dynamic display that celebrates these beloved characters in stunning detail.

Features:
🌟 4K Live Wallpaper: Enjoy high-quality visuals featuring Yoimiya and Amber in an immersive, animated design.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access your favorite websites with a single click.
➕ Customizable Shortcuts: Personalize your browsing by adding or removing shortcuts.
🔍 Search Bar: Use your preferred search engine seamlessly.
🕒 Clock & Calendar: Keep track of time with a sleek and stylish display.
Why Use This Extension?
Transform your browsing experience with vibrant designs while keeping your data secure. Install easily and remove anytime hassle-free.

Discover more live wallpaper extensions for your favorite games and characters on our website. Find themes like this and more to make every new tab uniquely yours!
